segments.text: This is heartbreaking— the sink's overflowing and no one cares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's so engrossed in her task, missing the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's ruining the cabinets, seeping everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor kids, trying to get cookies but risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is unsteady; he could get hurt so easily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's expectant face tugs at my heart—she just wants a snack.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking rules behind her back, which feels a bit lonely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside contrasts with this indoor trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the slip hazard on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes might shatter if someone tumbles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame such a nice kitchen is facing this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies in the jar look tempting, but at what cost?
segments.speaker: PAR
